de.stock.event

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stock.action.Action
      • de.stock.event.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainEvent, SubEvent

    public class Event
extends Action
    Base class of events

    The event system knows two real types of events which start and stop without the players influence (they run a number of rounds)

    - MainEvent can start on his own or by another event.

    - SubEvent can be started by another event only.

    (These events can influence environments, tradeables (through environment groups) and other objects)

    Event developers must instantiate MainEvent or SubEvent
    They must not instantiate this class
    Author:
    chlange

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<EnvironmentGroup> environmentGroups
      Environment groups that get influenced by this event
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Long> influencedObjects
      Influence objects, which are specified in Settings_Influencable, by Long value once the event starts

      Example: The entry <Settings_Influencable.PLAYER_MONEY, -100> will substract 100 from players money
      private Priority priority
      The priority of this event

      See Priority and Settings_Event for more information on priority
      private java.lang.Integer roundsBottomBound
      Bottom limit how many rounds this event stays

      Used by ActionObserver.iterateMainEvents() if a new event starts to calculate remaining rounds (in connection with roundsTopBound)
      private java.lang.Integer roundsTopBound
      Top limit how many rounds this event stays

      Used by ActionObserver.iterateMainEvents() if a new event starts to calculate remaining rounds (in connection with roundsBottomBound)

      • registerEnvironment

        public void registerEnvironment(Environment environment,
                       boolean isPositive,
                       java.lang.Double percentageBottomLimit,
                       java.lang.Double percentageTopLimit)
        Register a single environment

        The tradeables of this environment get influenced by a random percentage between percentageBottomLimit and percentageTopLimit

        (Gets internally saved as a environment group)
        Parameters:
        environment - Environment to register
        isPositive - Indicates whether the environment lets the tradeables raise (true) or fall (false)
        percentageBottomLimit - Bottom limit of influence in percent
        percentageTopLimit - Top limit of influence in percent
